title: my intentional feeding ban
body:
i think its unfair to do that because that is my real level and also the other teammates weren't that good so i think its unfair to ban me for 14 days

Please post the chat logs, I need the giggle :^)

Hey Tantram, not sure if it gets answered.

I got 2 Intentionally Feeder, that legit just ran it down Mid and actually admitted in the Chat to int and talked to us, about where we should go to kill them, that we should get Mejai's. The Soraka went 0/35/0 and the Garen went 1/12 with 6 Tears throughout the game.

Quick question now: They didnt got punished which in saw on their OP.GG. Any chance to get them banned afterwards for this games? Its fairly recent, i got their name, i can make a highlight with the ingame Client and ic an screenshot the game.
i think u should increase the bane
ok
First post, first smite.
ty

Steps to become a good player
1- stop blaming your team
2- learn from mistakes
3- DON'T USE THE ENEMY MISSING FOR ANY OTHER REASON
4- analyze how you died and dont repeat the same mistake
5- IF you're losing your lane, ask for help from your team and LET THEM CARRY YOU
6- IF there is a teamfight and you're a low hp champion eg: adc/squishy supports DON'T GO IN, stay behind and help your team on the right chance
7- main one champion for each lane and DON'T curse anyone or instalock in the champ select screen
8- DON'T act as a spoiled child eg: a bad bronze 5 yasuo

Thank you for reading and I hope you'll learn from your mistakes.
enjoy the soon coming permaban.
enjoy it too
ty i will.
if you are a toxic inting feeder then you deserver this ban 100% if you wanna remove your ban then every single person that got banned has to be unbanned -_-
